TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IIssuanceSecurityTokenAuthenticator

Docs.summary: Specifies the contract that should be implemented by a custom security token authenticator that issues tokens to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The token authenticators used by WCF for issuing SSLNEGO/SPNEGO `SecurityContextToken`s or SecureConversation-based `SecurityContextToken`s are `IIssuanceSecurityTokenAuthenticator`s.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ IssuedSecurityTokenHandler { System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::IssuedSecurityTokenHandler ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a handler for when the token is issued.
Docs.value: A delegate that handles the event when a token is issued.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ RenewedSecurityTokenHandler { System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::Tokens::RenewedSecurityTokenHandler ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a handler for when the token is renewed.
Docs.value: A delegate that handles the event when a token is renewed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate should be invoked only if the token authenticator handles renewal of issued tokens.
